descriptionHtml:
--IMPORTANT--

This replacement background is meant to be used with sprinks  Skyrim Improved Menu, and will not display correctly without it.
I didn\'t think it would be right to include his meshes and theme with this, so we\'ll just do it this way.

Installation:
Install sprinks \"Skyrim Improved Menu\"  from here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5729#content

I would reccomend the no snow version, as I think it looks better with this background. Although thats optional.

Drop the DATA folder in this archive to your Skyrim directory and say YES to the Overwrite.
author: ZayLa
